system.description:
When you @UUID[Compendium.urban-shadows-pbta.play-materials.Item.Oy3jQ5vR9wS2xT8u]{get in someoneâ€™s way}, take a 10+ instead of rolling.

If you @UUID[Compendium.urban-shadows-pbta.play-materials.Item.Lv0gN2sO6tP9uQ5r]{mislead, distract, or trick} someone with an obvious supernatural display, roll with SPIRIT instead of MIND.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: The MC tells you what interesting thing happens.

weak-hit.label: Weak Hit
weak-hit.value:
On a hit, they are fooled, at least for a moment. On a 7-9, pick 2:

  • you create an opportunity
  • you expose a weakness or flaw
  • you confuse them for some time
  • you avoid further entanglement

strong-hit.label: Strong Hit
strong-hit.value:
On a hit, they are fooled, at least for a moment. On a 10+, pick 3:

  • you create an opportunity
  • you expose a weakness or flaw
  • you confuse them for some time
  • you avoid further entanglement
